- Electric storage water heater (steel tank) with copper supply lines; located in a small utility closet.
- Top piping visible: copper cold water inlet and hot water outlet; no shutoff valve visible in view (verify accessibility).

- Exterior shows minor wear; no visible rust, leaks, or corrosion evident.
- Plastic bag covering the top area; remove to allow access and proper service/ventilation.
